description:
In combination with ActiveGates, network zones save bandwidth and infrastructure costs by 
* Compressing traffic 
* Optimizing traffic routing 
* Preventing unrelated traffic in between data centers and regions

enabled.description:
For details, see [Network zones](https://www.dynatrace.com/support/help/shortlink/network-zones). 

âš  Warning: You may experience network imbalance if you suddenly introduce network zones into an environment that has a high number of OneAgents. To avoid this and to ensure smooth adoption of network zones, follow best practices for planning and proper naming, as explained in [Network zones](https://www.dynatrace.com/support/help/shortlink/network-zones).
enabled.displayName: Enable network zones in this environment.
